con:config.script:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper import javax.xml.xpath.* import javax.xml.parsers.DocumentBuilderFactory
def associatedLocationsResponse = context.expand( '${getAssociatedLocation#ResponseAsXml#//Response[1]/e[1]/id[1]}' ) def i=associatedLocationsResponse log.info "$associatedLocationsResponse" testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("idlocation",associatedLocationsResponse) def idlocation = context.expand( '${#Project#idlocation}' ) testRunner.gotoStepByName('getLocationById') log.info idlocation
